content: materials - 6 12 skeins of purl soho s campo 1 50% wool and 50% organically grown cotton each skein is 120 yards/ 100 grams approximately 720 1440 yards required we used the color verona peach for the baby size and dolomite gray for the throw size - us 8 5 mm 32- or 40-inch circular needles 2 gauge 17 stitches and 22 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes baby throw finished dimensions 26 inches wide x 34¼ inches long 41¼ inches wide x 45¾ inches long blanket designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 3 based on the original diamond + dot wrap by katrin schubert 4 click here 5 to see even more of gianna s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/campo html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 4 https //www ravelry com/designers/katrin-schubert 5 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
